import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
df = pd.read_csv('../input/cannabis-strains/cannabis.csv')
df.info()
source.8da9e81d:
def get_effects(dataframe):
    count_eff = {}
    for lists in dataframe.Effects.mask(df['Effects'].astype(object).eq('None')).dropna(): #drop all 'None' values
        effects = lists.split(',')
        for eff in effects:
            if not eff in count_eff:
                count_eff[eff] = 1
            else:
                count_eff[eff] += 1
    count_eff = {k: v for k, v in count_eff.items() if v > 10} #removing small ones values
    return count_eff

def plot_effects(cannab_eff, strain_type):
    fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(12, 12))
    
    values = list(cannab_eff.values())
    labels = list(cannab_eff.keys())
    
    ax.pie(values, labels=labels, autopct='%1.1f%%')
    
    plt.title('Top effects of {} type of strain'.format(strain_type))
    
    plt.show()

indica = df[df['Type'] == 'indica']
sativa = df[df['Type'] == 'sativa']
hybrid = df[df['Type'] == 'hybrid']

indica_effects = get_effects(indica)
sativa_effects = get_effects(sativa)
hybrid_effects = get_effects(hybrid)

plot_effects(indica_effects, 'Indica')
plot_effects(sativa_effects, 'Sativa')
plot_effects(hybrid_effects, 'Hybrid')
